name: whentomeet
title: WhenToMeet
description: Create WhenToMeet scheduling events using natural language. Describe your event and get a pre-filled WhenToMeet URL instantly.
author: felix_wortmann

commands.name: create-event
commands.title: Create Whentomeet Event
commands.description: Create a WhenToMeet event from the Raycast UI.

tools.name: get-current-time
tools.title: Get Current Time
tools.description: Returns the current time and date information for parsing relative time expressions

tools.name: create-whentomeet-event
tools.title: Create Whentomeet Event
tools.description: Creates a new WhenToMeet event with the specified title, description, time slots, and duration

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
